attributes.action: Include the self employed in the jobs retention scheme
attributes.additional_details:
For the self employed it’s £376 per month.There are 5 million self employed people in the UK.
We need the government to announce equal measures to help now!
attributes.background:
After the chancellors announcement on Friday March 20th it was clear that the government are hanging the self employed out to dry.
Government assistance for employed people during the Covid 19 crisis is paying up to £2500 per month.

rejection.details:
Since you started your petition the Government has announced support for self-employed individuals: https://www.gov.uk/government/news/chancellor-gives-support-to-millions-of-self-employed-individuals

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus
